verses.name: Numbers 12:14
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Moses, If her father had but spit in her face, should she not be ashamed seven days? let her be shut out from the camp seven days, and after that let her be received in again.

verses.name: Numbers 12:15
verses.text: And Miriam was shut out from the camp seven days: and the people journeyed not till Miriam was brought in again.

verses.name: Numbers 12:16
verses.text: And afterward the people removed from Hazeroth, and pitched in the wilderness of Paran.
